movies.title: Rock the Casbah
movies.plot: The whole family is reunited when Sofia comes back for his father's funeral. Quickly, inner problems are revealed.
movies.simplePlot: The whole family is reunited when Sofia comes back for his father's funeral. Quickly, inner problems are revealed.

biography.bio: Morjana Alaoui was born in 1983 in Casablanca, Morocco. She is an actress, known for Martyrs (2008), Rock the Casbah (2013) and Golakani Kirkuk - The Flowers of Kirkuk (2010).
biography.name: Morjana Alaoui

biography.bio: Nadine Labaki was born on February 18, 1974 in Beirut, Lebanon. She is an actress and writer, known for Caramel (2007), Et maintenant on va où? (2011) and Rio, I Love You (2014). She has been married to Khaled Mouzanar since October 2007.
biography.name: Nadine Labaki

biography.bio: Hiam Abbass was born on November 30, 1960 in Nazareth, Israel. She is known for her work on The Visitor (2007), Les citronniers (2008) and Exodus: Gods and Kings (2014).
biography.name: Hiam Abbass

biography.bio: Lubna Azabal was born in Brussels, Belgium. She is an actress, known for Paradise Now (2005), Incendies (2010) and Body of Lies (2008).
biography.name: Lubna Azabal

biography.bio: Adel Bencherif was born on May 30, 1975 in Saint-Maurice, Val-de-Marne, France. He is known for his work on A Prophet (2009), London Has Fallen (2016) and Spectre (2015).
biography.name: Adel Bencherif

biography.bio: Omar Sharif, the Egyptian actor best known for playing Sherif Ali in Lawrence of Arabia (1962) and the title role in Doctor Zhivago (1965), was born Michel Demitri Shalhoub on April 10, 1932 in Alexandria, Egypt to Joseph Shalhoub, a lumber merchant, and his wife, Claire (Saada). Of Lebanese and Syrian extraction, the young Michel was raised a Roman Catholic. He was educated at Victoria College in Alexandria and took a degree in mathematics and physics from Cairo University with a major. Afterward graduating from university, he entered the family lumber business. Before making his English-language film debut with "Lawrence of Arabia", for which he earned a Best Supporting Actor Academy Award nomination and international fame, Sharif became a star in Egyptian cinema. His first movie was the Egyptian film Ciel d'enfer (1954) ("The Blazing Sun") in 1953, opposite the renowned Egyptian actress Faten Hamama whom he married in 1955. He converted to Islam to marry Hamama and took the name Omar al-Sharif. The couple had one child (Tarek Sharif, who was born in 1957 and portrayed the young Zhivago in the eponymous picture) and divorced in 1974. Sharif never remarried. Beginning in the 1960s, Sharif earned a reputation as one of the world's best known contract bridge players. In the 1970s and '80s, he co-wrote a syndicated newspaper bridge column for the Chicago Tribune. Sharif also wrote several books on bridge and has licensed his name to a bridge computer game, "Omar Sharif Bridge", which has been marketed since 1992. Sharif told the press in 2006 that he no longer played bridge, explaining, "I decided I didn't want to be a slave to any passion any more except for my work. I had too many passions, bridge, horses, gambling. I want to live a different kind of life, be with my family more because I didn't give them enough time." As an actor, Sharif had made a comeback in 2003 playing the title role of an elderly Muslim shopkeeper in the French film Monsieur Ibrahim (2003). For his performance, he won the Best Actor Award at the Venice Film Festival and the Best Actor César, France's equivalent of the Oscar, from the Académie des Arts et Techniques du Cinéma. Omar Sharif died of a heart attack on July 10, 2015, in Cairo, Egypt.
biography.name: Omar Sharif

biography.bio: Raouia is an actress and producer, known for L'Oracle (2013), Des hommes et des dieux (2010) and Casanegra (2008).
biography.name: Raouia

biography.bio: Assia Bentria is an actress, known for Rock the Casbah (2013).
biography.name: Assia Bentria

biography.bio: Lyès Salem was born in 1973 in Alger, Algeria. He is an actor and director, known for Munich (2005), Mascarades (2008) and The Man from Oran (2014).
biography.name: Lyès Salem

biography.bio: Hassan El Ganouni is an actor, known for Rock the Casbah (2013), La guerre du pétrole n'aura pas lieu (1975) and Eye on Juliet (2017).
biography.name: Hassan El Ganouni

biography.bio: Jad Mhidi Senhaji is an actor, known for American Sniper (2014) and Rock the Casbah (2013).
biography.name: Jad Mhidi Senhaji

biography.bio: Hadi Alaoui is an actor, known for Rock the Casbah (2013).
biography.name: Hadi Alaoui

biography.bio: Mohamed Ayad is an actor, known for Rock the Casbah (2013), Massafat Mile Bihidayi (2016) and Moudawala (2014).
biography.name: Mohamed Ayad

biography.bio: Fatim-Zahra Lahouitar is an actress, known for Rock the Casbah (2013).

biography.bio: Abdelkader Dourkan is an actor, known for Only Lovers Left Alive (2013), Rock the Casbah (2013) and Tangerine (2008).
biography.name: Abdelkader Dourkan
